title: Development of a Simulation/VR-Based Genre Analysis English Education Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and understanding of academic writing structures
context.additional_context: English communication enhancement program centered on academic texts in mathematics. Conducting actual academic presentations and discussion simulations in a VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the genre-specific structure (introduction-methods-results-discussion) of academic texts in mathematics with 90% accuracy.
Learners can utilize over 50 expressions required for presenting mathematical research results in English within a VR simulation environment.
Through peer assessment, learners generate and apply at least 20 English expressions for logically refuting arguments in academic discussions.
Learners can write abstracts for mathematics papers according to genre analysis principles through project-based assessment.

resources: AI program for automated feedback generation

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
